text: V blizhayshey zhizni, kogda ayaty Allakha, vyrazhayushchiye yasnyye znameniya i dokazatel'stva chitalis' neveruyushchim, oni otvrashchalis' ot nikh i, gordyas' svoim imushchestvom, govorili veruyushchim: "Vy ne tak schastlivy, kak my, v etom mire. My luchshe po svoyemu polozheniyu, prevoskhodneye po svoyemu sostavu, takzhe budet i v dal'ney zhizni
